inputs.remark:
缺少V2 后5个月的MRI复查和听力学检查
缺少gamma knife 后7个月的听力学检查
V3删除acoustic reflexes

logic_summary: Added visit 'V2_5m' (approx 2006-04) between V2 and V3 to capture the 5-month follow-up with MRI and audiological exam.
Added visit 'V_PostGK_7m' (approx 2006-12) after 'V2_5m' to capture the 7-month post-Gamma Knife audiological exam and the finding of absent acoustic reflexes.
Removed 'Acoustic reflexes' test from V3 (now index 4) as requested, since the finding of absent reflexes was noted in the interim 7-month follow-up.

history.present_illness: Follow-up 5 months after V2. Patient chose to wait and consider options.

tests.name: MRI
tests.key_findings: Tumor measured 1.7 x 0.9 x 1.0 cm, slightly increased in size compared with previous study.

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.key_findings: Left ear unchanged. Right ear thresholds decreased by 15 dB at 500 Hz, 35 dB at 6000 Hz, and 10 dB at 8000 Hz.

numeric_results.RE_change: Decrease of 15 dB at 500 Hz, 35 dB at 6000 Hz, 10 dB at 8000 Hz

tests.name: Speech audiometry
tests.key_findings: WRS decreased to 56% at 90 dB HL, increased to 70% at 100 dB HL.

numeric_results.RE_WRS: 56% at 90 dB HL, 70% at 100 dB HL

history.present_illness: Follow-up 7 months following Gamma Knife treatment.
history.otologic_history: Underwent Gamma Knife treatment approximately 2 weeks after the previous visit.

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.key_findings: Left ear stable. Right ear showed additional decrease: 10 dB at 250 Hz; 15 dB at 1000, 3000, 4000, 8000 Hz; 25 dB at 2000 Hz.

tests.name: Acoustic reflexes
tests.key_findings: All right ipsilateral and contralateral ARTs were now absent.
